create: INSERT INTO auditoria (id_usuarios, id_sesiones, id_modulos, id_acciones, fecha_hora, detalle, tabla_afectada, ip) VALUES ($1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6,$7,$8) RETURNING *;
update: UPDATE auditoria SET id_usuarios=$1, id_sesiones=$2, id_modulos=$3, id_acciones=$4, fecha_hora=$5, detalle=$6, tabla_afectada=$7, ip=$8 WHERE id_auditoria=$9 RETURNING *;
findAll: SELECT * FROM auditoria ORDER BY fecha_hora DESC LIMIT $1 OFFSET $2;
deleteById: DELETE FROM auditoria WHERE id_auditoria=$1 RETURNING *;
findByUser: SELECT * FROM auditoria WHERE id_usuarios=$1 ORDER BY fecha_hora DESC LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3;
findByModule: SELECT * FROM auditoria WHERE id_modulos=$1 ORDER BY fecha_hora DESC LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3;
findByAction: SELECT * FROM auditoria WHERE id_acciones=$1 ORDER BY fecha_hora DESC LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3;
filter: SELECT * FROM auditoria WHERE ($1::int IS NULL OR id_usuarios=$1) AND ($2::int IS NULL OR id_modulos=$2) AND ($3::int IS NULL OR id_acciones=$3) AND ($4::timestamp IS NULL OR fecha_hora >= $4) AND ($5::timestamp IS NULL OR fecha_hora <= $5) ORDER BY fecha_hora DESC LIMIT $6 OFFSET $7;
